# PR #26: Update headshots

**Status**: `MERGED` ✅ | **Branch**: `23-add-headshots` → `main`

**Changes**: +17 -1 across 4 files

## Description

Update headshots

## Comments

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-17 20:44:49

Updated print layout to always use the light version of the headshot image.

Added print-specific styles to ensure professional output:
- Light headshot always visible when printing
- Dark headshot always hidden when printing

This guarantees consistent professional print output with the light headshot on white paper, regardless of the current theme setting (light, dark, or system).

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/wclaytor/wclaytor.github.io/pull/26#issuecomment-3667086319)
